body: RESNICK - Herman A., M.D. (Spike). of Monteray, CA and Seagate, Brooklyn, NY. Devoted husband of the late Muriel. Beloved father of Amy. Dearest brother of Ralph. Loving grandfather, great grandfather and uncle. Not only will he be remembered by his loving family, but by his many, many patients to whom he devoted so much of himself in his lifetime.
title: Paid Notice: Deaths RESNICK, HERMAN A., M.D. (SPIKE)

body: About 50 parents, teachers and students protested yesterday in front of the Board of Education headquarters, expressing anger that the board had not renewed the contract of a popular district superintendent in south Brooklyn. Donald Weber, superintendent of District 21 for 17 years, resigned on July 5, five days after his contract expired.
title: Protest Backs Schools Chief In Brooklyn
